name: Morty Junior
description:
Play as the little Death's son in his scape to the Soup container with the mythical Soul gatherer and try to open the portal using the souls around the place.

Controls:

-"O" Key to hack dead bodies.

-Move with arrow keys. Space bar to Jump.  x2 to Double Jump.

-Empty the souls with R key in front of the door. It requieres 2 trips collecting.
